name: Demons (tishyo77, SheehanNC)
description:
Fight your Demons as a Warrior in a Fantasy World!

(Just a small HTML University project created by two people over a few weeks. Would appreciate feedback.)

Direct Link: https://tishyo77.github.io/Demons-2D-2Player-Game/ (Paste the link on your browser as directly clicking it shows an error for some unknown reason)

Warrior Controls:

  • Movement: WSD
  • Normal Attack: Spacebar
  • Jump Attack: W + Spacebar (Only works when the warrior is near the topmost position)
  • Toggle Shield: CTRL (Only protects against the normal attack of demon) 

Demon Controls:

  • Movement: Arrow Keys
  • Normal Attack: Down Arrow
  • Smash Attack: Up Key + Down Key 
  • Special Attack: Enter Key

Instructions:

Demon is slower than Warrior and can use Smash Attack once every 7 seconds and Special Attack every 5 seconds. Smash Attack is independent of the position of the Warrior to damage him and it can be dodged by jumping right before the attack. Demon does much more damage than Warrior but Warrior has methods of avoiding that damage.

(P.S. We have not added animations for Warrior Shield and Drinking Demon Attack. It may look confusing but they do work. We will be adding them soon.)

Future Updates:

  • Refined and more animations
  • Home Page and Controls Page
  • Option to Reload
  • More Demons with different Attacks
  • A more responsive page
